   :format: html

.. .. |Cbox|  replace::  :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">rugauga</span>`
.. |nbsp| replace:: :raw-html:`&#x00A0;`

.. .. |extrBP|  replace:: ..S rRNA 
.. .. |extr|  replace::  :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">...</span>`
.. |targetRNA-1|  replace:: 25S rRNA 
..   .. (1702-1711)
.. |target-1| replace:: :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">gtt<a href="../18s-tab.html#snRcneo3050_25S" title="25S target">C</a>tctttt</span>`
.. |ortholog| replace:: :raw-html:`with respect to their D guides, plant <a href="http://snoopy.med.miyazaki-u.ac.jp/snorna_db.cgi?mode=sno_info&id=Hordeum_vulgare300077">snoZ103</a>, or human <a href="http://snoopy.med.miyazaki-u.ac.jp/snorna_db.cgi?mode=sno_info&id=Homo_sapiens300268">SNORD30</a>`
.. |target-2| replace:: :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm">tttc<a href="../18s-tab.html#snRcneo3050_25S" title="18S target???">C</a>gt</span>`
.. |targetRNA-2|  replace:: 18S rRNA ?

snRcne03050-SNORD30
===================

.. figure:: /../_static/images/snoRNAs/snRcne03050_h99_igb.png
   :name: snRcne03050_h99_igb
   :align: left
   :width: 1389 px
   :height: 646 px
   :scale: 40%
   :figwidth: 100%

- snRcne03050-SNORD30_intronic-boxCDsnoRNA-in-CNE03050 (CNAG_02236)
- Within intron of CNE03050 (CNAG_02236) for Serine/threonine-protein phosphatase
- Predicted target of the D' guide is in |targetRNA-1|\ : |target-1| and appears unique for *Tremellomycetes*

.. figure:: /../_static/images/snoRNAs/25Sdom3_cne03050-target.svg
   :name: snRcne03050_h99_igb
   :align: left
   :width: 1912 px
   :height: 823 px
   :scale: 30%
   :figwidth: 100%

- The cytosine predicted to be modified is not present in yeast; substitutions cf. yeast 25S rRNA are in blue (change of purine or pyrimidine) or red (change from purine to pyrimidine or vice versa). 



- Poorly conserved D guide appears orthologous to, |ortholog|. This guide has complimentarity to many U-rich loci.
- Complimentarity of D-guide |target-2| with 18S (1774-1780) and two 25S loci (167-173, 1591-1597), seems too short to support methylation; targeted nucleotides are not described as modified in plant or human (human SNORD30 seems only functional via the D' guide which differs in its 25S target from that of *Tremellomycetes*).

.. figure:: /../_static/images/snoRNAs/snRcne03050-align.png
   :name: snrcne03050-align
   :align: left
   :width: 1661 px
   :height: 352 px
   :scale: 40%
   :figwidth: 100%


.. rst-class:: mononote

>AE017345.1:865876-866011 Cryptococcus neoformans var. neoformans JEC21 chromosome 5 sequence :raw-html:`</br>`
GCGTGTGAAGAAAAATACAAAAGAGGACCCTGAGGCTTTTGGGCCTGTGGAGATGGCTTACTTGGTGGGT :raw-html:`</br>`
CCGAGGTACGCTCATATGAGAAACCCGCCACCCGGTGAGCACGAGAGAACGGAAATCTGATGCTCA



|
|
|
|
|
|

- Putative targets in *C.*\ |nbsp|\ *deneoformans*, aligned to homologous sequences found in :doc:`snrcnag12093-species`. 
- No significant conservation present that would support a role for modification by the snoRNA.
- Only chromosomes 1 and 2 have been checked, and only for candidate targets with potential to base-pair to the full guide:
